summary.landDetails: Hilly, Stream, Pond, Mature Trees, Native Grasses, Wildflowers, Wooded Areas, Hiking Trails, Sunny Orientation

title: Sunny Acres
description: Sunny Acres is a beautiful piece of land located in the Southeast United States. The property spans 5 acres and is the perfect size for someone looking to build their dream home or for a small developer looking for a new project. The land is located on a gently sloping hill, providing beautiful views of the surrounding area. A small stream runs through the property, adding to its natural charm. There are several mature oak trees on the land, providing plenty of shade and a picturesque setting. The property is surrounded by lush greenery, including several varieties of native grasses and wildflowers. There is a small pond on the land, attracting a variety of local wildlife. The land is located in a secluded area, providing privacy and a sense of serenity. The property has several clearings that would be perfect for building a home or planting a garden. The land has a mix of open and wooded areas, providing a diverse range of habitats for wildlife. There are several hiking trails on the property, providing opportunities for outdoor recreation. The land has a south-facing orientation, ensuring plenty of sunlight throughout the day.
